item.title: The Wind Heard Her Confession
item.chaptername: Chapter 16: An Obvious Secret Crush part 2
item.description: Synopsis:¬†   Lin Yuran never would have thought that the client sitting across from her, forcing them both to work together, was the high school classmate she had rejected long ago, Chi Ye.   The two maintained a distant yet courteous relationship, keeping their distance as they worked together.   However, Lin Yuran gradually felt something wasn't quite right.   For example, why did this man insist on her working at his company instead of her own studio? And moreover, how come her office just so happened to be directly opposite his?   Another instance, when Lin Yuran accepted a ride in another man's Rolls-Royce Phantom, Chi Ye only sighed, "I thought I'd never get to ride a luxury car like this in my life."   The very next day, Chi Ye's car changed to a Bentley, then Bugatti, followed by Koenigsegg... Another time, Lin Yuran accidentally stumbled upon Chi Ye's Baidu profile and discovered that her favorite lollipop factory was registered under his name.   But rumor had it that the factory closed five years ago, and that some mysterious big shot loved eating these lollipops, so he bought the factory and continued production regardless of profit or loss, no matter what the situation.   Numerous clues led Lin Yuran to suspect‚Äî   Chi Ye still liked her?   Little did she know, even their second encounter was part of his plan.   Yet Chi Ye remained unaware that on that sweltering afternoon six years ago, Lin Yuran had quietly watched his lonely figure from afar and murmured softly, "If we meet again someday, I hope I can respond to you."   That year, only the wind heard her confession.

item.title: Little Fish and Mint
item.description: Xu Yitong had a cocky and pretentious younger cousin. Later, her cousin went pro in esports and "accidentally" provoked a famous player. Unfortunately, this player wasn't easy to mess with, and his fans were even fiercer. Her cousin was chased all over the internet, thoroughly flamed and roasted. Xu Yitong sighed, "What kind of people like him? Don't they have enough homework to do?" ‚Ä¶ Later that night, Xu Yitong messaged her cousin: [You'll laugh, but it turns out I'm the kind of person who likes him : ) ] [Don't piss off my husband again, okay?] "My preference for you is reflected in how I hate everything mint-related, yet you are my only Little Fish Mint." Chatty Young Miss x Cold Aloof King Tags: Love at First Sight, Lighthearted Main Characters: Xu Yitong, Yu Ge Other: Chatty Young Miss x Cold Aloof King One-sentence Summary: And you are my only Little Fish Mint Theme: You will always be my one and only

item.title: Mistakenly Treated The Princess As A Concubine
item.description: After the daughter of the former mistress of the Jing'an Marquis's residence, Wen Zhuojin, fell from grace and lost all support after her uncle's family declined, the engagement with the heir of the Rongguo Duke's residence was snatched away by her stepsister. After the broken engagement, rumors spread that Wen Zhuojin, who was said to be in mourning at home, disguised herself and went to a brothel in the western market of Yun Jing City. There, she bought the freedom of a young courtesan, taking her in and treating her like a precious jewel at a house she had prepared for her outside. The world believed that the engagement had been stolen from Wen Zhuojin, but in fact, it was a marriage she had long wanted to cancel. This was because Wen Zhuojin did not like men; she loved women, especially beautiful, mature women older than herself. The beautiful woman she brought home perfectly met her criteria. To support her lover, Wen Zhuojin worked hard in business, spending more on her lover‚Äôs clothes and living expenses than the courtiers in the palace. However, Wen Zhuojin could not openly give her lover a formal title, which made her feel guilty toward her. When she entered the palace to meet with the nobility, hoping to spend a fortune to secure a title for her beloved, Wen Zhuojin came face to face with the current Princess Royal. The Princess Royal wore a hibiscus crown and a black and blue ceremonial robe, holding a dust whisk. Her demeanor was as cold as a snow-capped mountain, exuding aloof elegance and an unworldly air. It was said that at the age of fifteen, the Princess Royal had helped her younger brother ascend the throne, quelled rebellions, subdued neighboring nations, and ruled decisively. She wielded unparalleled power and commanded universal reverence. She was also the woman Wen Zhuojin feared most. While everyone else knelt in respect, Wen Zhuojin stood frozen, trembling, staring in shock at the Princess. Who could tell her why the Princess looked exactly like her delicate and helpless lover sister?! ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî At the age of twenty, Princess Royal Yan Qinglan took her vows as a Taoist nun, swearing never to marry. She never expected that, at twenty-six, she would be poisoned, lose her sight, and be sweetly coaxed by a soft-voiced girl who brought her home. At that time, Yan Qinglan was trapped in a predicament. When she approached the girl, she noticed that the girl‚Äôs faint fragrance eased the pain of her poison flare-ups. She decided to follow the girl home to see what she was up to. The girl indeed had intentions for Yan Qinglan‚Äîbut not the kind Yan Qinglan imagined. Exquisite meals, fine clothes, and extravagant luxury surrounded her. Within days, Princess Yan Qinglan was pampered, becoming even softer and more delicate, her beauty becoming truly unmatched. And all the girl asked for in return was‚Äî "Sister, kiss me." "Sister, hug me." "Sister, cuddle me." The sweet voice, with a tone of coquettishness, whispered and enticed her every day. Slowly, Princess Yan Qinglan began to yearn for it. Even after her sight was restored, she continued to be the girl's "concubine" while stirring up the political scene, vying for power and influence. ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî Wen Zhuojin, upon realizing that Princess Yan Qinglan and her beautiful sister were the same person, packed her things and fled overnight. But before she could leave the city gates, she was surrounded by the Imperial Guard. Looking at the woman she once teased to tears and coaxed into embarrassing acts, now brimming with murderous intent, Wen Zhuojin was petrified. ‚ÄúAh Zhuo, if you leave, who will be my Empress?‚Äù Just as Wen Zhuojin thought her life was over, Yan Qinglan suddenly embraced her and whispered in her ear‚Äî

item.title: The Eldest Legitimate Daughter is Both Beautiful and Valiant (ELDBBV)
item.description:
In the previous life, the Zhenguo Duke‚Äôs mansion collapsed and completely vanished. In this lifetime, Bai Qing Yan, the eldest legitimate daughter was reborn and she will never let the Bai family follow the same footsteps than in the previous life.

The sons of the Bai family are already dead, so is there no place for the Bai family to stand in the capital? Xiao Rong Yan, a wealthy businessman from the Wei Kingdom said: ‚ÄúFor hundreds of years, the Zhenguo Duke‚Äôs Bai family of military lineage, never produced any waste, and the family‚Äôs daughters are no exception." Later‚Ä¶ the eldest miss of the Bai family was this generation‚Äôs goddess of war, legend had it that she had never been defeated. The second miss of the Bai family was the resourceful matriarch at the newly appointed Zhongyong Marquis' mansion. The third miss of the Bai family is this world‚Äôs second richest merchant, a talent of the business world who can decide the rains and clouds. Bai Qing Yan was grateful to Xiao Rong Yan for having helped her several times in the previous life, and secretly sent him information several times. On a snowy night, they were blocked outside the city. Xiao Rong Yan: Miss Bai saved me from fire and water again and again, is it that you admire me? Bai Qing Yan said: Young Master Xiao has misunderstood. Xiao Rong Yan: I saved Miss Bai from fire and water again and again, can Miss Bai admire me? Bai Qing Yan: ‚Ä¶

item.title: Rebirth of the Excellent Daughter of the Marquis Household (REDMH)
item.description: Gu Yu Qi, a daughter born to a marquis household. She was beautiful with knowledge in both civil and military, and her kindness broader than the sky. It was love at first sight for her, and she insisted on marrying him and was happy even if she were to become a mistress. She worked hard to help him step by step to become the emperor. But what happened to her in the end? For ten whole years, she was humiliated and abandoned. Disheartened, she drank poison to end her life and set her place on fire, only to find herself back to when she was ten years old. It was the year she followed her mother into the capital. It wasn‚Äôt too late to change her fate. If Yun Ke had any regrets in his previous life, then it would be how he always kept thinking about a woman who died decades ago. Because of that, before he died, he secretly had the woman‚Äôs ashes pressed beneath his coffin. As the emperor, he had the final say of everything under the sky. So how could he allow that woman to be arrogant in front of him? Even at his deathbed, he would crush her beneath him. Who knew he‚Äôd be reborn again‚Ä¶ When the transmigrated girl meets the boy who was reborn, Gu Yu Qi simply wanted to yell at the sky. Just what are you playing at!?

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***I Inflict a Love Tribulation on the Demon God 012***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless‚Äîcapable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder's script, Sheng Nuan is terrified... Later: A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: "Nuan Nuan, you're not allowed to go anywhere except by my side..." The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with blood: "Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?" The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: "Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon." The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: "Nuan Nuan, it‚Äôs your choice‚Äîkill me, or save me." Sheng Nuan became even more panicked...
If you‚Äôre enjoying the story, please consider:
  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!
If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements. Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).
If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: Transmigrating Before The Crazy Beauty Scum A Loses Control
item.description: Summary 1: "Even if it's a one-for-one trade, I will take over his company." These were the last words Luan Yenan said before transmigrating into a book. As the sole head of a Fortune 500 investment company, she never expected her end to be dying from overwork after three sleepless days and nights, only to transmigrate into a novel. The character she transmigrated into was a crazy, abusive Alpha who tormented the female lead before having her glands removed by the seemingly innocent but secretly cunning female lead. Crazy? Perfect, I‚Äôm crazy too. Abusive Alpha? Sorry, I‚Äôm single and not interested. As for the female lead, are you talking about the little girl I‚Äôve pinned down, teary-eyed and begging for mercy? Seemingly innocent but secretly cunning? Interesting. Let me personally train her. I want to see how she plans to cut out my glands. Summary 2: Zuo Baixuan, who had just differentiated into an Omega, was sold by her adoptive parents to a crazy, abusive Alpha. She thought her life would be plunged into darkness from then on. Unexpectedly, on the first day of their marriage, when she was pinned down, the Alpha, who was on the verge of losing control, suddenly calmed down and retracted her pheromones after Zuo Baixuan said, "I want to graduate smoothly, I don‚Äôt want to have a child so early." After that, the previously good-for-nothing Alpha seemed like a completely different person. She became a guest professor at the university, started a company, helped Zuo Baixuan seek revenge, and together they reached the pinnacle of life. One day, Luan Yenan‚Äôs pheromones went haywire, and she lay on her deathbed: "I‚Äôll set you free, let‚Äôs get a divorce." Zuo Baixuan chuckled, grabbed Luan Yenan‚Äôs hands, and pulled her closer: "I‚Äôve already graduated." "So?" "I want to have a child. With you." Let‚Äôs see who‚Äôs really the crazy one.

item.title: Transmigrated as a Cannon Fodder Wife A in Ancient Times
item.description: In the book, she is a useless person from a poor family. Because she is easy to control, Lu Zijin chooses her to be the redundant Alpha of the Lu family. Originally, she could have just enjoyed the easy life provided, but she gradually became greedy. She not only covets the Lu family‚Äôs wealth but also wants to make the female lead, Lu Zijin, submit to her. She tries to harm Lu Zijin several times, but each attempt is exposed. In the end, Lu Zijin and her childhood friend break both of Wei Lan‚Äôs legs and throw her out of the Lu family. A few days later, she dies. Wei Lan frowns as she looks at the original book‚Äôs content: Is the easy life not good enough, or is jade not worth carving? Why would you go and provoke the female lead for no reason? Learning her lesson, Wei Lan strictly follows the rules Lu Zijin sets for her, never crossing the line or actively seeking Lu Zijin‚Äôs attention. She rarely goes out, always holding a few unremarkable stones that she carves. At first, Lu Zijin finds this redundant Alpha well-behaved. She only allows Wei Lan to share her bed during the heat period and sends her away afterward. Wei Lan never complains. But gradually, Lu Zijin feels differently about this redundant Alpha. Even after the heat period, she enjoys being around Wei Lan. However, Wei Lan always declines because of the few rough stones she carries, making Lu Zijin dislike those stones. Over the past year, the most popular jade carver in the Great Zhou Dynasty is Qing Lan. This carver is extremely mysterious, rarely appearing in public. Even when she does, she wears a mask and a wide black hooded cloak, hiding her face. Her carvings are highly sought after and fetch high prices. One evening, the so-called redundant Alpha who lives off others returns. Wei Lan holds a stack of silver notes, her eyes sparkling as she looks at Lu Zijin: ‚ÄúWife, I sold my carved ornaments for a good price again.‚Äù Lu Zijin looks at Wei Lan with gentle eyes: ‚ÄúGood job, very obedient. There‚Äôll be a reward later.‚Äù Content Tags: Farming, Family Drama, Sweet Romance, Transmigration, Feel-Good, Marriage Before Love Wei Lan, Lu Zijin One-Sentence Summary: A guide for a cannon fodder redundant Alpha‚Äôs comeback Theme: Change your fate through hard work and gain a positive life.

item.title: Transmigrated Into an Ancient Famine Novel as a Scumbag Alpha (ABO, GL)
item.description: Ye Qing wakes up to find herself transported into an ancient famine novel, becoming a shameless rogue. During a famine, the original host scams food and drink in the city, committing all sorts of evil deeds. With an innocent and harmless face, she tricks the distressed Jiang Jinhuang into marrying her. After the marriage, the original host‚Äôs true nature is revealed. When Jiang Jinhuang refuses to consummate the marriage, the host relentlessly pressures and torments her, even nearly strangling Jiang Jinhuang‚Äôs younger sister to death. After enduring countless hardships, Jiang Jinhuang finally returns to the capital, where her family and childhood friend deal with the original host, whose final destination is a mass grave outside the city. Ye Qing, having received the entire plot, plans to stay far away from Jiang Jinhuang and live well in this ancient world. But just as she prepares to leave, her personal system activates, unlocking the spatial ability from her previous life. Unlike before, her space now includes land and a spiritual spring. The system tells her that by earning Jiang Jinhuang‚Äôs favor, she can gain rewards to ensure she won‚Äôt starve during the famine. Jiang Jinhuang‚Äôs favor +1, rewarded with 10 potato seeds; Jiang Jinhuang‚Äôs favor +1, rewarded with a 2-pound carp; Jiang Jinhuang‚Äôs favor +1, rewarded with 10 eggs‚Ä¶ Through her efforts, Ye Qing helps Jiang Jinhuang and her sister thrive during the famine. When she successfully escorts Jiang Jinhuang back to the capital and prepares to leave alone, Jiang Jinhuang‚Äôs eyes redden with tears. Jiang Jinhuang, the daughter of the Minister of Rites, is separated from her family during a visit to Linzhou when they are scattered by rioters. After many struggles, she reaches Linzhou but fails to find her relatives. Lost and desperate, she believes Ye Qing‚Äôs words and temporarily marries her. However, after the marriage, Ye Qing becomes a different person, constantly abusing her. Then, one day, Ye Qing suddenly changes for the better, protecting Jiang Jinhuang and her sister, ensuring they never go hungry. Later, Ye Qing even escorts them back to the capital. When Ye Qing tries to leave, Jiang Jinhuang blocks the door, her fox-like eyes staring at Ye Qing with an unreadable expression, saying, ‚ÄúWhere do you think you‚Äôre going, abandoning me?‚Äù |Qianyuan = Alpha, Kunze = Omega, Zhongyong = Beta| Content Tags: Personal Space, Sweet Story, Book Transmigration, Feel-Good Story, ABO, Stockpiling One-Sentence Summary: Living well and eating heartily in a famine novel~ Theme: Change your fate through effort and gain a positive life.

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.description: At the princess's banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face. Their eyes met, and in each other's gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair. "I'll go first..." "I'll head that way..." However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princess's maid and the second prince's attendant searching for them not far away. Helan Ci bit her lip: "What don't you just go to the princess?" Lu Wuyou endured: "I think the second prince is not bad either." Helan Ci: "If we keep talking, we'll only end up hurting each other!" Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: "Then let it be a mutual destruction." Helan Ci: "‚Ä¶?" A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husband's demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes. Helan Ci asked, ‚Äú‚Ä¶Can you handle this?‚Äù Lu Wuyou replied, ‚ÄúEven if I can‚Äôt, I have to. Who told me to marry you‚Äî I‚Äôm going to be a powerful minister. I can‚Äôt fall here.‚Äù Helan Ci, ‚ÄúThen do your best! I‚Äôm counting on you!‚Äù Lu Wuyou, ‚Äú‚Ä¶?‚Äù Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past. A student asked him how he had come this far. Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress. ===== Two chapters will be free every week (Sat & Sunday). If you enjoy this story consider rate and review this at NovelUpdates, also support me at ko-fi

item.title: My Bloody Valentine
item.description: ‚Äª This work contains immoral subject matter, violent acts, and descriptions of coercive relationships, among other things. Additionally, the settings, backgrounds, and characters in the work are all fictional. Please keep this in mind while enjoying the story. Han's simple daily life working part-time at a convenience store is suddenly turned upside down. "Your debt amounts to a total of one hundred million and seven thousand." With a timid and fearful personality, Han is unwittingly drawn into the world of the 'Tasenda' club to repay the massive debt he incurred. There, he meets Jang Taesin, a man who is a perfect fit for the depths of darkness. From the moment Taesin laid eyes on Han, he was inexplicably drawn to him and began to obsessively pursue him, offering a proposal to keep him from escaping. "I'll stay by your side only until I get tired of you. Once I'm tired of your body, I'll consider your debt paid and let you go." "How long will it take for you to get tired of me?" "About twenty times, and I won't get tired." However, instead of getting tired, the thirst only grew stronger. He wanted to see, touch, and possess him. Once he had his body, he found himself desiring his heart as well. "Why don't I ever get to see that cheap smile of yours?" "You'll never see me smile in front of you, even if I die." Taesin couldn't understand why Han hated him so much, and Han couldn't fathom Taesin's obsession with him. Thus, the tangled threads of a complex relationship began to weave between the two, as distant from the end of the world as they could be. Can these two people, who seem so far apart from the rest of the world, really be together?

item.title: Guide to the Fallen World
item.description: Jeong Yeo-won wakes up from a frozen state. When I opened my eyes, I found myself woke up 500 years later in a world that had already been destroyed. A monster suddenly appears from the gate. 'Esper', a godlike creature who has awakened his powers follow its lead. And the world is completely different from the past. Humans are no longer the masters of the Earth. The Espers, who are supposed to hunt monsters and protect the city, are actually leading the world to further destruction due to their rampage. The 'Guides' that could calm the Espers have already disappeared. But then. "I'm a guide?" The only guide who miraculously woke up in a discarded hibernation capsule. Yeo-won creates a guiding drug that slows down the rampage and distributes it around the world. Thus, the world is one step away from destruction, but now she must protect herself from the espers who seek to find and possess the guide. A drop of water that falls on dry land, Will it be able to moisten the earth, or will it dry up and disappear in the heat.

item.title: Failed to Pretend to Be an Alpha and Got Marked by the Enemy (ABO, GL)
item.description:
When Yu Jing was 19 years old, she still hadn‚Äôt differentiated, but it didn‚Äôt affect her image as a beautiful and strong Alpha in the eyes of her fans. Three years after her debut, she won over a huge group of loyal fans while somehow gaining an enemy‚Äîactress Ming Zhu, known as the queen of ratings. Ming Zhu was an Alpha; sheclashed with Yu Jing at an event, and Yu Jing thought they‚Äôd never cross paths again. But, by some twist of fate, they were invited to the same reality show. Before filming even started, their fans were already tearing each other apart on Weibo. Yu Jing couldn‚Äôt resist checking the comments and got angrier the more she read. She could accept being called a has-been, and she could tolerate accusations of riding Ming Zhu‚Äôs fame. But someone dared question her gender, saying she‚Äôd definitely differentiate as an Omega??? Yu Jing suppressed the urge to jump into the fray, secretly swearing: Once I differentiate into a top-tier Alpha, I‚Äôll crush all you haters and your idol into the ground! Then she differentiated into a delicate Omega. And got pinned against the wall by Ming Zhu. In an intimate room‚Äî Ming Zhu‚Äôs fingers brushed over the fragile skin hiding her gland, looking down at the person in her arms, her tone soft: ‚ÄúAre you okay?‚Äù Yu Jing‚Äôs hands weakly clung to her neck, her cheeks flushed, her voice soft and pleading: ‚ÄúMark me already, please.‚Äù
Warnings: 1. Lots of original world-building, Alphas don‚Äôt have male anatomy. 2. Melodramatic plot, slow-burn romance, proceed with caution if it‚Äôs not your thing. Main Characters: Yu Jing, Ming Zhu | Supporting Characters: |

item.title: Dressed as the Scumbag Alpha Mom of the Tragic Female Lead (ABO, GL)
item.description: What made Jiang Chuxie collapse even more than transmigrating into a blood-type novel was that she became the scumbag Alpha dad of the book‚Äôs female lead‚Ä¶ or rather, mom? The scumbag Alpha mom relied on the female lead‚Äôs mother, Gu Lingjun, to rise to wealth and prominence. She teamed up with her mistress to kill the original wife and seize the family fortune that should have belonged to the female lead, setting the stage for the female lead‚Äôs tragic life. As for the ending, this scumbag Alpha naturally didn‚Äôt fare well either. She was ultimately ruined by her daughter‚Äôs six Alphas, left with a shattered family and no place to be buried. Jiang Chuxie had no desire to follow in the original body‚Äôs footsteps. She didn‚Äôt want to be a scumbag, nor did she want to be killed. She just wanted to live peacefully‚Ä¶ Wait, why does the person sleeping beside her look so much like‚Ä¶ Gu Lingjun? Jiang Chuxie couldn‚Äôt escape the fate of an ABO novel. Forced to marry due to pregnancy and reluctantly accepting her fate, the gentle Omega, who had always been submissive, suddenly changed drastically. She broke up, threw money at her, and ran off pregnant, turning the tables and making Jiang Chuxie the one who got played. Jiang Chuxie: Wait, isn‚Äôt something off with this plot? Gu Lingjun: If it‚Äôs off, that‚Äôs just right. Content tags: Childbirth, Soul Swap, Rekindled Romance, Feel-Good, ABO, Lighthearted

item.title: Double Junk
item.description: "I'll pay a high price," said Seokju, the boss of the Taeho faction, to the crippled gang member Ajin, marking the beginning of their relationship born out of a misunderstanding one night. "Like you have a leg disease. I have insomnia. Shall we help each other as patients?" Using Seokju's insomnia as an excuse, Ajin fell asleep in his embrace, becoming accustomed to his body temperature. "I want to work at your place until I die." "Then just stay here. Here, in my room, sit on my knees. Let me bring the world to this room. But doubts keep sprouting, despite sealing the cracks of happiness." "Ajin, you can't leave this room until you've paid off all your debts." Now, this room became Ajin's world, yet he found solace in the fact that Seokju didn't abandon him.

item.title: Don't Provoke the Black Lotus O [Transmigration Novel]
item.description: A light-hearted, humorous, face-slapping, satisfying read. A quirky and clever Alpha √ó a cold, black lotus Omega. Jiang Ci transmigrated into the role of a cannon-fodder villain in an ancient ABO novel. The original body, a prestigious first-rank military marquis with illustrious battle achievements, married the female lead out of lust for her beauty. After marriage, his true nature was revealed: he imprisoned and abused her, and as a womanizer, he filled his courtyard with concubines, favoring them over his wife... In the end, he was mutilated by the blackened princess, who removed his gland, severed his limbs, and locked him in a pitch-dark dungeon. When Jiang Ci transmigrated, she found herself straddling the female lead, engaged in unspeakable acts. Jiang Ci immediately revealed her true self: "I'm not Gao Yi! I won't take the blame for this! I can even prove it by breakdancing!" Female lead: "???" The system issued a task: "Please fix the messed-up plot, torment the female lead, and promote her descent into darkness." Jiang Ci: "No time for you." System: "???" ‚Ä¶ Jiang Ci had been single for over twenty years and had only ever liked one fictional character. Now that she had transmigrated into her lord, how could she not seize this heaven-sent opportunity? No matter who you are, she would confront heaven and earth, and teach a lesson to anyone who bullied the female lead! After all, she had become the villain‚Äîit would be a shame not to act domineering and arrogant! She gave her all to the female lead, protecting her at every turn, helping her build her career, and imparting all her skills... Only to eventually realize that she was just a substitute, that the female lead had always harbored a white moonlight in her heart. All the ambiguity between them was because she resembled that person. Jiang Ci: "Can I know who she is?" Female lead: "No." Jiang Ci was finally numb. Heartbroken and disillusioned, she exchanged rewards with the system and returned to her original world. ‚Ä¶ Later, the woman who had ascended to the pinnacle of power got drunk at a palace banquet. "Have you found her?" Maid: "Your Highness has forgotten, she was a soul transmigrator, not belonging to this world. We don't even know her real name." The wine cup fell to the ground, and the woman's eyes dimmed. ‚Ä¶ When Jiang Ci woke up again, she found herself still in the novel, but now she had transmigrated into her own body, and ten years had passed. The young girl she once needed to protect had now become the powerful and influential Grand Princess. It was said that this Grand Princess was cold and aloof, with her only peculiar hobby being to capture those with eccentric personalities and suspected of having delusions. Jiang Ci wanted nothing to do with the Grand Princess this time and tried her best to keep her identity hidden. However, the Grand Princess, after ten years, had thoroughly studied all of Jiang Ci's tactics, surpassing her teacher and excelling even further. #Toshootoneselfinthefoot# #Dugherowngrave# Reading Guide: 1. Happy ending (HE), no change in CP, both characters are pure. 2. Ancient ABO setting: Alpha (A) = Qianjun, Omega (O) = Kunjun, Beta (B) = Zhongjun. 3. Heavy use of private settings, the entire story is fictional.

item.title: Bondage and Marriage
item.description: Noah, a masochist who enjoys pain. One day, due to his father's arbitrary decision, he is forced into an arranged political marriage with a man named Ian Miller... "...Ah, I got it right this time? Yeah, I'll use this for my fianc√©. What of it?" Ian's voice continued soothingly. "Even if I just torment him a little, that young master will run off crying to his daddy. If he's an alpha, he might even be traumatized." In this world, is this a dream or reality? Is my fianc√© now buying adult toys from my favorite club just to torment me? That sounded far more alluring and sweet than any love confession Noah had ever heard. Noah immediately changed the resolve he had just made to not marry Ian Miller. Someone who would even pluck a star from the sky for him is nothing special, and someone who hates him is nothing special either, but someone who will torment him is most welcome. This marriage must happen! It absolutely must! The delusion and love between a lovable, cute masochist and a lone, serious bad guy!

item.title: After Transmigrating Into a Book, I Was Forced to Play the Role of a Scumbag Alpha (GL)
item.description: Shen Hanzhi woke up and found herself transmigrated into a novel as the villainous Alpha with the same name. The original Shen Hanzhi forced Wen Jin, a pitiful female protagonist from a fallen family, to marry her. She plundered Wen Jin‚Äôs possessions, forcibly marked her, and, after growing bored, brought a lover home to provoke the already pregnant Wen Jin. Wen Jin lost her child and was imprisoned by Shen Hanzhi in a villa; she was completely blackened. Later, with the help of the male protagonist Liang Shuo, Wen Jin escaped the Shen family and ruined Shen Hanzhi‚Äôs reputation, leaving her as a madwoman on the streets. Shen Hanzhi received the original novel‚Äôs plot. When she regained her senses, she was putting a wedding ring on Wen Jin‚Äôs finger. She turned to flee the wedding scene, but before she could move, her central nervous system received a shock. Along with the shock, a strange voice echoed in her mind: The host cannot act out of character, or the villainous Alpha system will judge it as immediate death. At this, Shen Hanzhi felt completely numb! Thus, Shen Hanzhi and Wen Jin‚Äôs daily life became like this: Shen Hanzhi glared fiercely at Wen Jin: ‚ÄúYou wrote my name so uglily, so you must write it ten more times as punishment!‚Äù Shen Hanzhi stared at the delicate girl on the bed with a harsh tone: ‚ÄúI told you eight hundred times to eat more green peppers for nutrition, but you picked them out again!‚Äù Wen Jin lived in a quagmire. She was an illegitimate daughter treated as a shame by the Wen family, living worse than a dog. Before leaving the Wen family at nineteen, she couldn‚Äôt even read. A woman named Shen Hanzhi taught her to read, took her to various places to have fun, and gave her the life a person should have. Her Sister Shen was perfect in every way, except her tone sometimes sounded fierce. But when Wen Jin watched TV, she understood it was the flirtation between wives, so she wasn‚Äôt afraid. When Wen Jin turned twenty, Shen Hanzhi finally accumulated enough villainous Alpha points to divorce the girl and live her own life. But the girl hugged her neck and coquettishly said: ‚ÄúSister, I like it when you bully me.‚Äù

item.title: After Going on a Blind Date With My Omega Love Rival (ABO, GL)
item.description: Yu Heyi received a wedding invitation from the Omega she had secretly loved for years, she was lying in a hospital bed. She got into a car accident during a race and had to retire. Under the double blow, Yu Heyi accepted her mom‚Äôs suggestion. Going on a blind date. Her mom praised the other person like crazy, saying they were a perfect Omega, beautiful and soft and gentle. Then‚Ä¶ She found out the blind date was her most hated person, no one else came close! Her love rival‚ÄîChi Ruixi. She still hadn‚Äôt figured out how her beta love rival turned into an Omega. And on the day of the blind date, she marked her. It was Chi Ruixi, crying and begging her to mark her‚Ä¶ Afterward, Yu Heyi said three things. ‚ÄúI‚Äôll take responsibility, I‚Äôll fulfill an Alpha‚Äôs duties.‚Äù ‚ÄúI‚Äôll treat you well, I‚Äôll be considerate.‚Äù ‚ÄúBut don‚Äôt expect love.‚Äù Chi Ruixi heard this, gave a slight smile, and said, ‚ÄúNo need.‚Äù Jobless Yu Heyi was arranged by her mom to work as a chef in the cafeteria of XX Middle School. She found out the gentle and delicate literature teacher was‚ÄîChi Ruixi? But Chi Ruixi‚Äôs cold words made her feel weird, a bit uncomfortable. Yu Heyi thought it was pheromones that drew her to Chi Ruixi, otherwise why would she find Chi Ruixi, the bridesmaid at the wedding, way more charming than the bride she‚Äôd loved for years. Then, in a daze, she permanently marked Chi Ruixi. Chi Ruixi kept waiting for that dumb Alpha to admit she loved her, but her dumb Alpha was truly dumb. Main characters: Yu Heyi, Chi Ruixi | Supporting characters: Jiang Qi, Chi Shengxi, Chi Ying, Zhan Yuan | Others: Du Ruo, Old Yu One-line summary: After failing a blind date with my love rival, I marked her.

item.title: Dare to Cancel the Engagement? I Will Marry Your Ancestor!
item.description: Mo Ling is transmigrated into another world and unexpectedly becomes a sect master. However, things don't go as planned when Long Ziyan publicly breaks off their engagement, putting Mo Ling in a difficult position. The Long family had originally fled to Beihan Prefecture and survived under the original Mo Ling's protection, only to betray him later, causing his death. This allows Mo Ling to take over the body. Facing internal and external challenges, Mo Ling finds himself at a critical juncture...

item.title: The White Moonlight Disdained by the Male Protagonist of Redemption
item.nameextend: ***He Would Protect Luoxiang Mountain with His Life***
item.description: Ning Yao died tragically. The man she had saved and cared for for many years despised her and shattered her spirit veins with his own hands and dissolved her body. Ning Yao: ‚ÄúThank you. I have waited for this day.‚Äù „ÄÄ Ning Yao is from the ancient Bodhi clan, kind by nature but without a heart. One year, she rescued a demon from the hands of the immortal Xuanmen, who was tortured and dying. She took good care of him, curing his years of illness and scars. She did not mind his humble status and liked him wholeheartedly, always smiling, hugging, and kissing him. Every time at that moment, Feng Jingzhuo felt pity and helplessness, and his love deepened. Little Bodhi (Ning Yao) cured his disabled and ugly body and cured his inferiority, self-loathing, sensitivity, and paranoia. How could he not be infatuated and loyal and love her deeply? But what Feng Jingzhuo did not know was that according to the rules of the Bodhi clan's ascension, one must first save others to prove the truth and then die and be reborn before ascending. And Ning Yao's lifelong wish is to ascend. „ÄÄ„ÄÄ That year, the eldest sister failed to ascend to heaven, and before she and her brother-in-law retired to the world sweetly, she pointed out a clear path for Ning Yao: ‚ÄúYao Yao, our Bodhi clan is too beloved. Who could bear to use us as a stepping stone for enlightenment?‚Äù ‚ÄúIf you‚Äôre truly set on it, why not try that demon imprisoned by the immortal sect? Pfft‚Äîthose fools don‚Äôt know his worth. He‚Äôs from the Cangyuan Dragon Clan.‚Äù ‚ÄúIf it works, great. If not‚Ä¶ well, you could always fall in love, just like I did.‚Äù Her elder sister revealed a secret about the Cangyuan Dragon Clan: If they fall deeply enough in love, their hearts will grow scales to shield them from their emotions. When that happens, their instincts will turn against their beloved, giving rise to an uncontrollable urge to kill. Slay one‚Äôs beloved, attain enlightenment, ascend immediately, and forget the past. A perfect outcome for both. Ning Yao knew that Feng Jingzhuo had already begun to grow his heart‚Äôs scales. Yet, he endured the agonizing pain, hiding away to claw open his own chest. He ripped out the endlessly growing scales, pinned his own hands down with bone nails‚Äîdesperately resisting his dragon instincts. ‚ÄúYao Yao, don‚Äôt come in‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚ÄúI beg you‚Ä¶ whatever you do, don‚Äôt come in‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚ÄúIt‚Äôll be over soon. Be good. Stay outside‚Ä¶‚Äù Outside, Ning Yao pondered, if¬†we can both ascend, that‚Äôs better than neither of us ascending at all. So, she went in. Just as she always did, she held him in her arms, kissing his trembling, pale lips with tenderness. After many 10 thousand years, Ning Yao was reborn and successfully ascended. She forgot Feng Jingzhou, but he remembered her. Tormenting himself, he wanted to turn back time. Ning Yao was very happy, but the ceremony of conferring the gods was a little simple. Because the entire world of gods was busy trying to stop a fallen god who wants to activate the forbidden Time-Reversal Array.„ÄÄ„ÄÄ „ÄÄ„ÄÄ Theme: My heart is controlled by me, not by heavens.

item.title: It Was A Fake Marriage, But Jiu Qian Sui Took It Seriously
item.description: OVERVIEW:   In her past life, Shen Qing Li married her cousin Jiang Zhi Li with a huge dowry left by her father. She thought her new family was kind, but they were all wolves in disguise, just wanting to take her family's wealth. She not only helped her husband raise the son of his mistress, but the mistress openly moved into their home, took over her position, and even mistreated her child. In the end, both she and her child met a tragic end. In this life, Shen Qing Li firmly broke off the engagement with Jiang Zhi Li and decided to leave with her mother. However, her maternal family set up something unexpected.

item.title: Commoner Queen: Falling in Love with His Royal Highness the Crown Prince
item.description: The betrayal of her boyfriend and sister made her commit suicide by jumping into a lake. Unexpectedly, she traveled to another world, and her soul was attached to a woman named Murong Ziying. People said that body was unlucky for her husband, but so what? She is her, and I am me. No one can stop her from loving His Royal Highness.

item.title: The Young Male Protagonist Who is Destined for Ruin Fell for Me
item.description: The man I had a drunken one-night stand with turned out to be the male lead from the original story. The issue? This ridiculously rich, handsome, and incredibly fit younger guy is set to start a war in two years. And me? I need to get out of here, obviously. So, I said, "I only liked you for your money." "Is that so? I have plenty of money. Does that mean you like me a lot, then?" He leaned in, planting a light kiss on my cheek, then asked in a low voice, "Besides the money, what else do you like about me? Yesterday, it seemed like you were quite into my face and body too." "What?" "I'm guessing you‚Äôre in love with me..." "Ack!" Instinctively, I screamed to block his love confession. But Kyle, as if he'd just realized something, grinned brightly. "I get it now, noona. You don‚Äôt want to hear me say I love you, right?" Exactly, that‚Äôs it! "In that case, I‚Äôll express it in a way you like better than words." With that, Kyle tugged his tie loose and stepped closer to me. No! I don't want you to express it with your body either!

item.title: Crossing the Two Realms: From a Trader to an Immortal Emperor
item.description: Chen Le'an lives in a world where spiritual energy is scarce, making cultivation difficult. Even more unfortunately, Chen Le'an is diagnosed with brain cancer. He is fired from his company, his wife cheats on him, divorces him, and he is forced to leave the house. Just when he is desperate, he finds that he can travel to a world with abundant spiritual energy. In his original world, resources are limited, but technology is advanced. In the new world, resources are abundant, but technology is lacking. Chen Le'an realizes he can travel between both worlds...

item.title: With The Fifth Loop, The Third Prince Has Been Added To The Cast.
item.description: The eldest daughter of the Count's family, Cheryl Atley, is repeating the same time over and over again. No matter how many times she repeats it, her fianc√©, Franz Eldred, is only interested in her younger sister, and he never looks back at her. She dies on the day of her graduation from school, and she is back to square one. Then, unable to find a way to end the loop, she is in despair for the fifth time when the third prince, Prince Camus, appears, overturning the previous rules. She wants to end this loop, no matter what form it takes. Will Cheryl's wish come true this time?   Short Novel: 10 chapters only

item.title: Banishment is Fine: As a Genius Saint, I Can Shine Anywhere.
item.description: Overview:   "What's wrong with deciding your own path in life?¬†   Meteora is a chief saint with an extraordinary power. One day, she was suddenly stripped of her title and was demoted. While those around her are in an uproar, she departs with a smile, saying,¬† ‚ÄúPlease don't call me back. I'm deeply annoyed with all of you,‚Äù she says with a smile and walks away.‚Äù A heroic fantasy about an exiled saint!

item.title: Sweet Kiss
item.description: In the bustling city of Qinghui, Hengshan First High School is welcoming new students. Among them, Bai Tingzhou stands out for his remarkable achievements in the National High School Math Competition, which earns him a lot of attention. He was known as the "untouchable treasure" of Hengshan First High School and a favorite of the guidance director. He could only be admired from afar; many people tried to add him on WeChat but found that they couldn't even find his account. Meanwhile, the third-year students are stressed about their upcoming class placement exams. Xu Mu brings news of a new, beautiful transfer student, Li Yansui, who wants to join their top science class. This news stirs curiosity and excitement among the students, though Bai Tingzhou and his friend Qi Jinyang remain uninterested. A playful confrontation between Qi Jinyang and Bai Tingzhou is interrupted by the arrival of Mr. Wang and Li Yansui, who surprise Bai Tingzhou by revealing their past acquaintance.   ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬†

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***I Inflict a Love Tribulation on the Demon God 011***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless‚Äîcapable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder's script, Sheng Nuan is terrified... Later: A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: "Nuan Nuan, you're not allowed to go anywhere except by my side..." The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with blood: "Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?" The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: "Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon." The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: "Nuan Nuan, it‚Äôs your choice‚Äîkill me, or save me." Sheng Nuan became even more panicked...
If you‚Äôre enjoying the story, please consider:
  1. Supporting the author

item.title: The Story of How I Pretended To Be A Boy and Ended Up Being Loved By A Mafia Boss
item.description: Anis lives in the slums with her mother. From morning until night, she makes a living by shining shoes in the noble district. One of her regular customers, Ryu, sometimes shows up without warning. Chatting with him has become Anis‚Äôs only joy in her otherwise boring days. ‚ÄúI wonder when I‚Äôll see him again‚Ä¶‚Äù she thinks as she keeps polishing leather shoes. It‚Äôs been five years since she first met Ryu, and Anis is now eighteen. ¬† She thought their relationship ‚Äî just a shoe-shining girl and a regular customer ‚Äî would stay the same forever‚Ä¶ But when Anis steps into the nightlife for the first time, she starts to see a new side of Ryu, one she never noticed before. Slowly, their relationship begins to change. And then, meeting a certain person starts to change Anis‚Äôs life in a big way‚Ä¶?! ¬†

item.title: Transmigrating Before The Crazy Beauty Scum A Loses Control
item.description: Summary 1: "Even if it's a one-for-one trade, I will take over his company." These were the last words Luan Yenan said before transmigrating into a book. As the sole head of a Fortune 500 investment company, she never expected her end to be dying from overwork after three sleepless days and nights, only to transmigrate into a novel. The character she transmigrated into was a crazy, abusive Alpha who tormented the female lead before having her glands removed by the seemingly innocent but secretly cunning female lead. Crazy? Perfect, I‚Äôm crazy too. Abusive Alpha? Sorry, I‚Äôm single and not interested. As for the female lead, are you talking about the little girl I‚Äôve pinned down, teary-eyed and begging for mercy? Seemingly innocent but secretly cunning? Interesting. Let me personally train her. I want to see how she plans to cut out my glands. Summary 2: Zuo Baixuan, who had just differentiated into an Omega, was sold by her adoptive parents to a crazy, abusive Alpha. She thought her life would be plunged into darkness from then on. Unexpectedly, on the first day of their marriage, when she was pinned down, the Alpha, who was on the verge of losing control, suddenly calmed down and retracted her pheromones after Zuo Baixuan said, "I want to graduate smoothly, I don‚Äôt want to have a child so early." After that, the previously good-for-nothing Alpha seemed like a completely different person. She became a guest professor at the university, started a company, helped Zuo Baixuan seek revenge, and together they reached the pinnacle of life. One day, Luan Yenan‚Äôs pheromones went haywire, and she lay on her deathbed: "I‚Äôll set you free, let‚Äôs get a divorce." Zuo Baixuan chuckled, grabbed Luan Yenan‚Äôs hands, and pulled her closer: "I‚Äôve already graduated." "So?" "I want to have a child. With you." Let‚Äôs see who‚Äôs really the crazy one.

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.description: At the princess's banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face. Their eyes met, and in each other's gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair. "I'll go first..." "I'll head that way..." However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princess's maid and the second prince's attendant searching for them not far away. Helan Ci bit her lip: "What don't you just go to the princess?" Lu Wuyou endured: "I think the second prince is not bad either." Helan Ci: "If we keep talking, we'll only end up hurting each other!" Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: "Then let it be a mutual destruction." Helan Ci: "‚Ä¶?" A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husband's demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes. Helan Ci asked, ‚Äú‚Ä¶Can you handle this?‚Äù Lu Wuyou replied, ‚ÄúEven if I can‚Äôt, I have to. Who told me to marry you‚Äî I‚Äôm going to be a powerful minister. I can‚Äôt fall here.‚Äù Helan Ci, ‚ÄúThen do your best! I‚Äôm counting on you!‚Äù Lu Wuyou, ‚Äú‚Ä¶?‚Äù Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past. A student asked him how he had come this far. Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress. ===== Two chapters will be free every week (Sat & Sunday). If you enjoy this story consider rate and review this at NovelUpdates, also support me at ko-fi

item.title: Mistakenly Treated The Princess As A Concubine
item.description: After the daughter of the former mistress of the Jing'an Marquis's residence, Wen Zhuojin, fell from grace and lost all support after her uncle's family declined, the engagement with the heir of the Rongguo Duke's residence was snatched away by her stepsister. After the broken engagement, rumors spread that Wen Zhuojin, who was said to be in mourning at home, disguised herself and went to a brothel in the western market of Yun Jing City. There, she bought the freedom of a young courtesan, taking her in and treating her like a precious jewel at a house she had prepared for her outside. The world believed that the engagement had been stolen from Wen Zhuojin, but in fact, it was a marriage she had long wanted to cancel. This was because Wen Zhuojin did not like men; she loved women, especially beautiful, mature women older than herself. The beautiful woman she brought home perfectly met her criteria. To support her lover, Wen Zhuojin worked hard in business, spending more on her lover‚Äôs clothes and living expenses than the courtiers in the palace. However, Wen Zhuojin could not openly give her lover a formal title, which made her feel guilty toward her. When she entered the palace to meet with the nobility, hoping to spend a fortune to secure a title for her beloved, Wen Zhuojin came face to face with the current Princess Royal. The Princess Royal wore a hibiscus crown and a black and blue ceremonial robe, holding a dust whisk. Her demeanor was as cold as a snow-capped mountain, exuding aloof elegance and an unworldly air. It was said that at the age of fifteen, the Princess Royal had helped her younger brother ascend the throne, quelled rebellions, subdued neighboring nations, and ruled decisively. She wielded unparalleled power and commanded universal reverence. She was also the woman Wen Zhuojin feared most. While everyone else knelt in respect, Wen Zhuojin stood frozen, trembling, staring in shock at the Princess. Who could tell her why the Princess looked exactly like her delicate and helpless lover sister?! ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî At the age of twenty, Princess Royal Yan Qinglan took her vows as a Taoist nun, swearing never to marry. She never expected that, at twenty-six, she would be poisoned, lose her sight, and be sweetly coaxed by a soft-voiced girl who brought her home. At that time, Yan Qinglan was trapped in a predicament. When she approached the girl, she noticed that the girl‚Äôs faint fragrance eased the pain of her poison flare-ups. She decided to follow the girl home to see what she was up to. The girl indeed had intentions for Yan Qinglan‚Äîbut not the kind Yan Qinglan imagined. Exquisite meals, fine clothes, and extravagant luxury surrounded her. Within days, Princess Yan Qinglan was pampered, becoming even softer and more delicate, her beauty becoming truly unmatched. And all the girl asked for in return was‚Äî "Sister, kiss me." "Sister, hug me." "Sister, cuddle me." The sweet voice, with a tone of coquettishness, whispered and enticed her every day. Slowly, Princess Yan Qinglan began to yearn for it. Even after her sight was restored, she continued to be the girl's "concubine" while stirring up the political scene, vying for power and influence. ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî Wen Zhuojin, upon realizing that Princess Yan Qinglan and her beautiful sister were the same person, packed her things and fled overnight. But before she could leave the city gates, she was surrounded by the Imperial Guard. Looking at the woman she once teased to tears and coaxed into embarrassing acts, now brimming with murderous intent, Wen Zhuojin was petrified. ‚ÄúAh Zhuo, if you leave, who will be my Empress?‚Äù Just as Wen Zhuojin thought her life was over, Yan Qinglan suddenly embraced her and whispered in her ear‚Äî

item.title: Gloria von Caldwell's Condemnation and Revenge
item.description: Be kind to the "target" to avoid condemnation? Use your "knowledge of otome games" to live as a commoner in hiding? ...Pathetic. Find a lover better than your fianc√© and have them take revenge? --Leaving your fate in the hands of others is utterly laughable. Friendship and love are unnecessary. If it's for revenge, I'll bow my head, but I will always crush them all later, without fail. This is the story of Gloria, a villainous noblewoman who is wholly dedicated to revenge. Gloria, of the Duke of Caldwell's family, was accused of injuring the saint who had received the crown prince's true love at her graduation party. Then, she was framed for another crime she didn't commit and was executed. She died cursing everything in this world that had wronged her, but when she woke up, she was ten years old again, revived. At the same time, a ghost from another world appeared, saying, "This is the world of otome games, and Gloria is a villainous lady." But instead of ignoring it, she made the ghost submit and decided to live her second life solely for revenge. <+> Tn: If you want to see more chapter of this story, please join my¬†Patreon, for $5 each month, you can read all of the available chapter. Patreon Account: patreon.com/LuoJiyu

item.title: Giving Interstellar Players a Horror Ghost Game Shock
item.description:
Ye Yuxi has lived in the interstellar world for 20 years and has just remembered that she is a proud transmigrator. Before her transmigration, she was an avid fan of horror games; after transmigrating, she coincidentally became a university student majoring in game design. In this interstellar world, where everyone is a tough, bloodthirsty warrior, violent and gory games are all the rage‚Äîmost notably, games about hunting insectoid aliens and zombies. A search across the star network reveals no concept of supernatural horror games at all! What does this mean? It means there is a vast untapped blue ocean of opportunity! With this in mind, Ye Yuxi rolls up her sleeves and decides to give the interstellar residents a little shock with horror female ghost! She launches Campus Nightmare, and interstellar players are terrified: ‚ÄúI‚Äôve never been this scared of school!‚Äù She releases Residential Area Battle Royale, and interstellar players cry: ‚ÄúThis isn‚Äôt the battle royale I‚Äôve played before!‚Äù She rolls out A Loving Home, and interstellar players go crazy: ‚ÄúWhere‚Äôs my quilt barrier? Is there any safe place in this world?!‚Äù Later, after receiving the 10,086th complaint message from a terrified player, Ye Yuxi calmly accepts an interview: ‚ÄúAt first, I just wanted to make a small game I‚Äôd enjoy. I never expected it to be so popular, so I ended up making a few more‚Ä¶‚Äù Players who were scared out of their wits: ‚ÄúWe thank you!‚Äù  
If you‚Äôre enjoying the story, please consider:
  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on¬†NovelUpdates!

item.title: The Tyrant's Happy Ending
item.description: BL fantasy novel set in a Western-style Omegaverse. It follows the story of Lyle Beltimore, a duke who rises to power after being betrayed by his first love, Yernen Helio, a prince who later becomes a tyrant. Lyle returns to the capital after years of war and finds Yernen dead. However, Yernen reincarnates into the body of Prince Fortnum, Lyle‚Äôs new fianc√©, and must now navigate his second life, torn between his past regrets and the possibility of a new future with Lyle. Themes of love, betrayal, revenge, and redemption are central to the plot, with intense emotional struggles and a chance at a happy ending in Yernen‚Äôs second life.

item.title: The Male Lead's Harem Belongs to Me (GL)
item.description: Synopsis: Jiang Han died from staying up too late reading a novel, and after her death, she found herself transported into the ancient melodramatic romance novel she had been reading. The male lead is a cold and domineering prince, and the female lead is the prince's long-cherished "white moonlight". Unfortunately, the white moonlight has a lowly status, and the prince's mother disapproves. The male lead goes to great lengths, enduring countless melodramatic events, heart-wrenching and physically exhausting, ultimately winning the heart of his beloved and achieving a happy ending. And Jiang Han is one of the cannon fodder female characters who, out of jealousy, targeted the male lead's white moonlight. Jiang Han, who traveled through time, said: "No way, I just want to be a salted fish and play mahjong every day." So when the male lead said: "I want to marry my white moonlight." Jiang Han: Marry! You must marry! The gifts are all ready. The male lead said: "She is timid and frail. As the princess, you should take good care of her." Jiang Han: Take care! Must take care of !Tomorrow, I'll have her live next to me! The male lead said: "She's too considerate. She won't speak up about her needs, so you should be more accommodating to her." Jiang Han: Move! Must yield! Tomorrow, I will divorce you and give the title of princess to her! ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ The next day, Jiang Han indeed handed him a divorce letter. The male lead, feeling complicated, signed it, but Jiang Han happily prepared to leave. Just as she reached the gate of the mansion, a group of concubines led by White Moonlight blocked her way. White Moonlight: Sister Jiang, don't go. Would you stay? A group of concubines: Yeah, yeah, please don't leave. Jiang Han showed a troubled expression, and the male lead's heart was filled with joy. Just as he was about to say a few words of persuasion, he saw Jiang Han decisively shake her head. The male lead thought it was a pity. Before he could catch his breath, he saw the person he held dear, his "white moonlight," take out a divorce agreement and coldly say to him, "Sign it. I want to leave with Sister Jiang." The male lead stared wide-eyed in disbelief, a mouthful of old blood choked in his chest. However, the next moment, his group of concubines gritted their teeth and said to White Moonlight: "Weiwei, you are being too ungrateful. Why did you prepare the divorce papers all by yourself without telling us?" #My harem seems to have turned into my princess's, what should I do# #Is it too late to regret now# ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ One-on-one [highlight this], before the divorce, they were just pure revolutionary comrades and good friends. After the divorce, there will be romantic developments.

item.title: The Wind Heard Her Confession
item.chaptername: Chapter 16: An Obvious Secret Crush part 1
item.description: Synopsis:¬†   Lin Yuran never would have thought that the client sitting across from her, forcing them both to work together, was the high school classmate she had rejected long ago, Chi Ye.   The two maintained a distant yet courteous relationship, keeping their distance as they worked together.   However, Lin Yuran gradually felt something wasn't quite right.   For example, why did this man insist on her working at his company instead of her own studio? And moreover, how come her office just so happened to be directly opposite his?   Another instance, when Lin Yuran accepted a ride in another man's Rolls-Royce Phantom, Chi Ye only sighed, "I thought I'd never get to ride a luxury car like this in my life."   The very next day, Chi Ye's car changed to a Bentley, then Bugatti, followed by Koenigsegg... Another time, Lin Yuran accidentally stumbled upon Chi Ye's Baidu profile and discovered that her favorite lollipop factory was registered under his name.   But rumor had it that the factory closed five years ago, and that some mysterious big shot loved eating these lollipops, so he bought the factory and continued production regardless of profit or loss, no matter what the situation.   Numerous clues led Lin Yuran to suspect‚Äî   Chi Ye still liked her?   Little did she know, even their second encounter was part of his plan.   Yet Chi Ye remained unaware that on that sweltering afternoon six years ago, Lin Yuran had quietly watched his lonely figure from afar and murmured softly, "If we meet again someday, I hope I can respond to you."   That year, only the wind heard her confession.

item.title: Within The Sound of Swallows
item.description: At the tender age of five, Shen Guiyan could recite the Thousand Character Classic from memory; at the age of six, she could already play guqin and even composed her own melodies; at the age of seven, she could write a full poem and finish it in the brief time it took for the incense stick to burn; and by the time she turned eight, she was already betrothed to the son of the Prime Minister. Everyone said that she was born with Phoenix Jade* in her mouth‚Äî destined for greatness from the very start. However, fate took a cruel turn. A woman from the modern era arrived and transformed Shen Guiyan‚Äôs once-brash younger sister into someone sharp and clever. She stole her fianc√©, harmed her birth mother, and ruthlessly pulled her down from the heavens. Laughing arrogantly, she sneered, ‚ÄúHow can a mere woman from the feudal era ever compete with a modern woman of the 21st century?‚Äù Schemes and trickery altered her predestined fate, a pregnant belly destroyed her marriage prospects, and she was forced to marry a spoiled and troublemaking son of a noble, who brought ruin upon her on her supposed wedding night. And yet,¬† by some strange twist of fate, it inadvertently led her to the most extraordinary encounter with her fated one. A crazy monk once read her fortune: a great calamity at the coming of age, a great joy at the age of twenty, and a great sorrow in old age. Shen Guiyan did not believe in fate. She only believed that with human determination, one could even overcome destiny. Those who took from her, she would make sure they would pay! Those who harmed her, she would make sure they would burn in the pits of hell!¬† So what if you have traveled through time? So what if you have been reborn? Even if you have eight or ten golden fingers**, I would chop them all up for you! I would be coming for you, no matter what!   *born with Phoenix Jade in her mouth - this symbolizes a noble or auspicious birth, often implying destiny, luck, or even divine favor. **golden fingers - Chinese slang for cheat-like powers, or supernatural advantages

item.title: The Second Son of The Marquis Runs Away from Home ~ Lacking Talent, He Abandons Everything and Becomes an Adventurer ~
item.description: "I can't take it anymore..." Constantly compared to his prodigious elder brother, who is hailed as a genius, Serk strives relentlessly to earn recognition. However, unable to bear it any longer, Serk reaches his breaking point and runs away not only from home but from the country itself. He becomes an adventurer in the land he escapes to, but...

item.title: Within The Sound of Swallows
item.nameextend: ***Eyeing the Pot While Still Eating from the Bowl***
item.description: At the tender age of five, Shen Guiyan could recite the Thousand Character Classic from memory; at the age of six, she could already play guqin and even composed her own melodies; at the age of seven, she could write a full poem and finish it in the brief time it took for the incense stick to burn; and by the time she turned eight, she was already betrothed to the son of the Prime Minister.
