item.title: The Goddess Granted Me the [Hatching] Skill and Somehow I Became the Strongest Tamer, Commanding Mythical and Divine Beasts
item.description: Klaus, who was on the verge of death due to a high fever, met a goddess and was specially granted the ‚ÄòHatching‚Äô skill. When he regained consciousness, he found himself lying in bed surrounded by his parents and his younger sister, Celia. Later, after various events, Klaus became an adventurer and discovered a large egg deep in the forest. When he hatched it, a phoenix emerged. For some reason, a familiar contract was automatically formed, along with the bonus of being able to use some of the familiar's abilities. As Klaus fully manifested the true power of ‚ÄòHatching‚Äô, he gradually began to attract attention among adventurers and eventually caught the eye of the nation...

item.title: The Foolish General's Mute Spouse
item.description: General Qi Ren, known as the "Mad Wolf" was once an undefeated war god. However, he was poisoned by an enemy spy on the battlefield, which left him mentally impaired, leading to the tragic downfall of a legendary hero. The Emperor, relieved to have neutralized this formidable threat to his throne, felt a twinge of guilt. Hearing rumors that the "madman" harbored affection for the timid and mute Seventh Prince, Fu Yu'an, the Emperor decided to arrange their marriage, believing it to be a benevolent gesture. However, after the wedding, Fu Yu'an, who had to play both father and mother to the seemingly foolish general, was shocked when he saw the "madman" climbing into his bed with clear, calculating eyes. Fu Yu'an kicked him off and exclaimed, "You're not a fool?" To which Qi Ren retorted, "And you're not mute, are you? We're both hiding our true selves‚Äîso why the disdain?" "...‚Äù

item.title: I Have been Reincarnated As a Lazy, Arrogant Noble, but When I Destroyed The Scenario Through Effort, I Became The Most Powerful With Extraordinary Magical Power
item.description: "Weiss Fancent" A debased villainous noble with an arrogant attitude, embodying true evil. Before I realized it, I had been reincarnated as that man. This despicable scumbag, who despised effort and was beyond redemption, would eventually become a minion of the Demon Lord and be deceived, only to be executed. "Noblesse Oblige." This is the aristocratic academy game that I love. But... "I'll shatter that kind of scenario." I will alter the path of destruction. As I started making efforts, with the help of those around me, my stats began to rise, and I enrolled in the academy, the stage of this story. However, it is there that I realize. "Am I... too strong?" This is the story of a man reincarnated as a lazy noble, who breaks the scenario through relentless effort and becomes the most formidable.

item.title: After Retirement, Living a Stud Life in Another World
item.description: After drinking too much at my retirement celebration, I woke up to find myself inexplicably transformed into a beautiful young boy in another world. In this world where magic reigns supreme, there's a catch ‚Äì only women can use magic. The value of men lies in their ability to produce magically powerful offspring, recognized only through the demanding role of a 'stud' in a challenging setting. Somehow, when I engage in procreation, both the children and their mothers gain peculiar powers. Before I knew it, my surroundings were filled with women. Is this some kind of cheat?

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***I Inflict a Love Tribulation on the Demon God 009***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthless‚Äîcapable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodder's script, Sheng Nuan is terrified... Later: A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: "Nuan Nuan, you're not allowed to go anywhere except by my side..." The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with blood: "Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?" The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: "Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon." The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: "Nuan Nuan, it‚Äôs your choice‚Äîkill me, or save me." Sheng Nuan became even more panicked...
If you‚Äôre enjoying the story, please consider:
  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!
If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (cannibalturtle) or report it in the Dragonholic Discord server. Join the server and get your role to get the fastest and most recent chapter release notifications and announcements. Release schedule: Advance chapters will be updated daily at 8 PM (UTC+8).
If you love what I do, you can buy me coffee on ko-fi to show your support.

item.title: Sylvie, the Slave Girl (Lily Futa)
item.description: Wei Qing lived for over twenty years and never saw such a crazy crossing. She was a straight woman, crossed into a porn game she played years ago. She wondered why the hell it was a modified version. Did it want to drive her mad? ‚Äî‚Äî Wei Qing calmed her mood and often looked at the obedient cute girl with loving eyes. She nodded satisfactorily‚Äîshe was a good child. Wei Qing drank the water the girl handed her without caution. She went to bed and felt especially sleepy today. She grew somewhat drowsy... ‚Äî‚Äî Today‚Äôs dream... why was it especially real? The girl was completely naked; she straddled her waist. A beautiful young lady with no emotional intelligence vs. a gloomy, seductive, pitiful girl.

item.title: Little Fish and Mint
item.nameextend: ***Where‚Äôs my service fee for pressing your hand tonight? Ten yuan! Trying to skip out on the bill?***
item.description: Xu Yitong had a cocky and pretentious younger cousin. Later, her cousin went pro in esports and "accidentally" provoked a famous player. Unfortunately, this player wasn't easy to mess with, and his fans were even fiercer. Her cousin was chased all over the internet, thoroughly flamed and roasted. Xu Yitong sighed, "What kind of people like him? Don't they have enough homework to do?" ‚Ä¶ Later that night, Xu Yitong messaged her cousin: [You'll laugh, but it turns out I'm the kind of person who likes him : ) ] [Don't piss off my husband again, okay?] "My preference for you is reflected in how I hate everything mint-related, yet you are my only Little Fish Mint." Chatty Young Miss x Cold Aloof King Tags: Love at First Sight, Lighthearted Main Characters: Xu Yitong, Yu Ge Other: Chatty Young Miss x Cold Aloof King One-sentence Summary: And you are my only Little Fish Mint Theme: You will always be my one and only

item.title: The Eunuch Has A Wife
item.description: Bai Zhi is an eunuch‚Äîa fake eunuch. In her past life, the empress bestowed upon her a wife, the princess of a fallen kingdom. However, when the crown prince attempted to assault her wife, he was killed in self-defense. In the end, the fake eunuch and the princess of the fallen kingdom met their fate by being beheaded in public, their lives filled with humiliation and absurdity. When Bai Zhi opened her eyes again, she found herself reborn one year earlier, when the beautiful and tragic princess of the fallen kingdom had just been tied up and thrown onto her bed. This time, she only wanted to survive, but as she tried to leave, she was stopped. The princess, with teary eyes, clutched her sleeve and asked, "Husband, won‚Äôt you take me with you?" Bai Zhi replied, "From now on, I can only live a hard life of farming. You should find your own way." Princess: "I am willing to accompany you in a life of men plowing and women weaving." Bai Zhi: "..." But I am a woman!

item.title: Don't Provoke the Black Lotus O [Transmigration Novel]
item.description: A light-hearted, humorous, face-slapping, satisfying read. A quirky and clever Alpha √ó a cold, black lotus Omega. Jiang Ci transmigrated into the role of a cannon-fodder villain in an ancient ABO novel. The original body, a prestigious first-rank military marquis with illustrious battle achievements, married the female lead out of lust for her beauty. After marriage, his true nature was revealed: he imprisoned and abused her, and as a womanizer, he filled his courtyard with concubines, favoring them over his wife... In the end, he was mutilated by the blackened princess, who removed his gland, severed his limbs, and locked him in a pitch-dark dungeon. When Jiang Ci transmigrated, she found herself straddling the female lead, engaged in unspeakable acts. Jiang Ci immediately revealed her true self: "I'm not Gao Yi! I won't take the blame for this! I can even prove it by breakdancing!" Female lead: "???" The system issued a task: "Please fix the messed-up plot, torment the female lead, and promote her descent into darkness." Jiang Ci: "No time for you." System: "???" ‚Ä¶ Jiang Ci had been single for over twenty years and had only ever liked one fictional character. Now that she had transmigrated into her lord, how could she not seize this heaven-sent opportunity? No matter who you are, she would confront heaven and earth, and teach a lesson to anyone who bullied the female lead! After all, she had become the villain‚Äîit would be a shame not to act domineering and arrogant! She gave her all to the female lead, protecting her at every turn, helping her build her career, and imparting all her skills... Only to eventually realize that she was just a substitute, that the female lead had always harbored a white moonlight in her heart. All the ambiguity between them was because she resembled that person. Jiang Ci: "Can I know who she is?" Female lead: "No." Jiang Ci was finally numb. Heartbroken and disillusioned, she exchanged rewards with the system and returned to her original world. ‚Ä¶ Later, the woman who had ascended to the pinnacle of power got drunk at a palace banquet. "Have you found her?" Maid: "Your Highness has forgotten, she was a soul transmigrator, not belonging to this world. We don't even know her real name." The wine cup fell to the ground, and the woman's eyes dimmed. ‚Ä¶ When Jiang Ci woke up again, she found herself still in the novel, but now she had transmigrated into her own body, and ten years had passed. The young girl she once needed to protect had now become the powerful and influential Grand Princess. It was said that this Grand Princess was cold and aloof, with her only peculiar hobby being to capture those with eccentric personalities and suspected of having delusions. Jiang Ci wanted nothing to do with the Grand Princess this time and tried her best to keep her identity hidden. However, the Grand Princess, after ten years, had thoroughly studied all of Jiang Ci's tactics, surpassing her teacher and excelling even further. #Toshootoneselfinthefoot# #Dugherowngrave# Reading Guide: 1. Happy ending (HE), no change in CP, both characters are pure. 2. Ancient ABO setting: Alpha (A) = Qianjun, Omega (O) = Kunjun, Beta (B) = Zhongjun. 3. Heavy use of private settings, the entire story is fictional.

item.title: The White Moonlight Disdained by the Male Protagonist of Redemption
item.nameextend: ***He Would Protect Luoxiang Mountain with His Life***
item.description: Ning Yao died tragically. The man she had saved and cared for for many years despised her and shattered her spirit veins with his own hands and dissolved her body. Ning Yao: ‚ÄúThank you. I have waited for this day.‚Äù „ÄÄ Ning Yao is from the ancient Bodhi clan, kind by nature but without a heart. One year, she rescued a demon from the hands of the immortal Xuanmen, who was tortured and dying. She took good care of him, curing his years of illness and scars. She did not mind his humble status and liked him wholeheartedly, always smiling, hugging, and kissing him. Every time at that moment, Feng Jingzhuo felt pity and helplessness, and his love deepened. Little Bodhi (Ning Yao) cured his disabled and ugly body and cured his inferiority, self-loathing, sensitivity, and paranoia. How could he not be infatuated and loyal and love her deeply? But what Feng Jingzhuo did not know was that according to the rules of the Bodhi clan's ascension, one must first save others to prove the truth and then die and be reborn before ascending. And Ning Yao's lifelong wish is to ascend. „ÄÄ„ÄÄ That year, the eldest sister failed to ascend to heaven, and before she and her brother-in-law retired to the world sweetly, she pointed out a clear path for Ning Yao: ‚ÄúYao Yao, our Bodhi clan is too beloved. Who could bear to use us as a stepping stone for enlightenment?‚Äù ‚ÄúIf you‚Äôre truly set on it, why not try that demon imprisoned by the immortal sect? Pfft‚Äîthose fools don‚Äôt know his worth. He‚Äôs from the Cangyuan Dragon Clan.‚Äù ‚ÄúIf it works, great. If not‚Ä¶ well, you could always fall in love, just like I did.‚Äù Her elder sister revealed a secret about the Cangyuan Dragon Clan: If they fall deeply enough in love, their hearts will grow scales to shield them from their emotions. When that happens, their instincts will turn against their beloved, giving rise to an uncontrollable urge to kill. Slay one‚Äôs beloved, attain enlightenment, ascend immediately, and forget the past. A perfect outcome for both. Ning Yao knew that Feng Jingzhuo had already begun to grow his heart‚Äôs scales. Yet, he endured the agonizing pain, hiding away to claw open his own chest. He ripped out the endlessly growing scales, pinned his own hands down with bone nails‚Äîdesperately resisting his dragon instincts. ‚ÄúYao Yao, don‚Äôt come in‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚ÄúI beg you‚Ä¶ whatever you do, don‚Äôt come in‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚ÄúIt‚Äôll be over soon. Be good. Stay outside‚Ä¶‚Äù Outside, Ning Yao pondered, if¬†we can both ascend, that‚Äôs better than neither of us ascending at all. So, she went in. Just as she always did, she held him in her arms, kissing his trembling, pale lips with tenderness. After many 10 thousand years, Ning Yao was reborn and successfully ascended. She forgot Feng Jingzhou, but he remembered her. Tormenting himself, he wanted to turn back time. Ning Yao was very happy, but the ceremony of conferring the gods was a little simple. Because the entire world of gods was busy trying to stop a fallen god who wants to activate the forbidden Time-Reversal Array.„ÄÄ„ÄÄ „ÄÄ„ÄÄ Theme: My heart is controlled by me, not by heavens.

item.title: Commoner Queen: Falling in Love with His Royal Highness the Crown Prince
item.description: The betrayal of her boyfriend and sister made her commit suicide by jumping into a lake. Unexpectedly, she traveled to another world, and her soul was attached to a woman named Murong Ziying. People said that body was unlucky for her husband, but so what? She is her, and I am me. No one can stop her from loving His Royal Highness.
